name: Asteroids 3D (Chonibi)
description:
Overview

Welcome to Asteroids 3D, a game about flying around in space shooting at big rocks.

There are two modes of play:

- In Level Mode, hunt down asteroids within an area of space under a time limit. Try to get the highest score possible over the course of 3 levels.

- In Endless Mode, try to survive as long as you can and rack up the highest score possible before dying.

------------------------------

Controls

Move Mouse - Look, turn, & aim

W - Thrust forwards

S - Thrust back

A - Thrust left

D - Thrust right

Space - Thrust up

Left Ctrl - Thrust down

Q - Roll left

E - Roll right

Left Shift - Boost

Tab - Switch weapons

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Number 1 - Switch between 3rd and 1st person perspectives

------------------------------

Credits
